abstract: Concerns about an overheated market for high-yield bonds are being applied in China, which has its own set of potential risks.
snippet: Concerns about an overheated market for high-yield bonds are being applied in China, which has its own set of potential risks.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — It has an all-too-familiar ring. Investors in search of better interest rates rush to risky, high-yield bonds, raising worries that the market is overheated.

headline.main: As the Pace of China’s Junk Bond Sales Grows, So Do Worries
headline.print_headline: As the Pace of China’s Junk Bond Sales Grows, So Do Worries
